text: Winfried Freudenberg (29 August 1956 - 8 March 1989) was the last person to die in an attempt to escape from East Germany to West Berlin across the Berlin Wall as he fell from an improvised gas balloon at high altitude over West Berlin. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:1989 deaths Category:Accidental deaths from falls Category:Berlin Wall
title: Winfried Freudenberg
